file_content.text: The Umbra is working like a charm. You and Yuun did great work.
Good luck, Captain.
Hmm. Unit eleven is lagging behind... maybe unit thirty-eight could reinforce them.
Colonel, sir. Sergeant Yuun has completed his reconstruction of the Umbra encrypter, sir.
Hmm? Ah, that's fantastic! Stand at ease, Captain. Let's have a look.
It's smaller than I'd expected. Tough to believe it's so vital.
I understand you worked with Sergeant Yuun quite a bit to help make this happen. What did you think of him? You can speak freely.
Sergeant Yuun will be a great credit to Havoc Squad.
An exemplary soldier.
I couldn't agree more, Captain. I couldn't agree more.
I don't understand Yuun's methods, but his results are solid.
Unusual, but effective.
My feelings exactly, Captain.
Yuun's a bit of a crackpot, sir.
He's bizarre.
Ha! I'll admit, he has a strange way of doing things.
I'd trade any ten soldiers in my command to keep Yuun around, but I understand he's needed for something much bigger.
I don't need to know what insane thing High Command has you up to--but you'll be glad you have Yuun with you, I guarantee it.
Yuun is going to be very helpful in future missions.
I already am.
That he will.
I'm not so sure about that, Colonel.
We'll see.
I think you will be, in time.
Havoc Squad is needed elsewhere now, sir. With your leave, I should get going.
Is that all?
Of course. I don't want Garza on my back for holding you up.
Best of luck in your operation, Captain. You're dismissed.
Good day, Captain.
